title: Google fixes I/O slip-up that made several language mistakes during Translate segment
content:
The Google I/O 2022 keynote brought a lot of exciting announcements, but also a glaring mistake. While talking about Google Translate, the company showed the Arabic incorrectly.

The post Google fixes I/O slip-up that made several language mistakes during Translate segment appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: A slip-up during the Google I/O 2022 keynote incorrectly showed the Arabic language and others incorrectly during a Translate segment.
